Dictionary of Learners

Source: R/mlr_learners.R

Dictionary of Learners

Usage

See Dictionary.

See also

Other Dictionary: Dictionary, mlr_measures, mlr_resamplings, mlr_tasks

Other Learner: Learner

Examples

mlr_learners$keys()
#> [1] "classif.crashtest" "classif.dummy"     "classif.rpart"    
#> [4] "classif.verbose"   "regr.dummy"        "regr.rpart"       
as.data.table(mlr_learners)
#>                   id packages
#> 1: classif.crashtest         
#> 2:     classif.dummy         
#> 3:     classif.rpart    rpart
#> 4:   classif.verbose         
#> 5:        regr.dummy         
#> 6:        regr.rpart    rpart
mlr_learners$get("classif.dummy")
#> Learner 'classif.dummy' for classif
#> Parameters: 
#> Feature types: logical, integer, numeric, character, factor, ordered
